uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB

Class Reviews

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB.Reviews
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Reviews
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DTO that describes a collection of Review. Used for database storage, manipulation and XSLT display.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies
    See Also:
    Review, Serialized Form

      An interface for writing custom review filtering functions.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public java.lang.Boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        True if there are no reviews in this collection

      • postReview

        public void postReview(Review review)
        Add a review to the list of reviews in memory. Does not update the database.
        Parameters:
        review - The review to add
        See Also:
        ReviewsApplication

      • deleteReview

        public void deleteReview(Review review)
        Removes a review from the list of reviews in memory.
        Parameters:
        review - The review to delete

      • getReviews

        public java.util.ArrayList<Review> getReviews()
        Returns:
        A reference to the ArrayList of reviews

      • getReview

        public Review getReview(int id)
        Locates and returns the Review with the specified ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the review to return
        Returns:
        The review with the given ID number

      • translateTo

        public Reviews translateTo(java.lang.String language)
        Implements the Microsoft Language Services SOAP client to translate this collection of reviews to the language specified by 'language'.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to which the review will be translated. Can be any Language Code defined by Microsoft
        Returns:
        This collection of Review where the message is translated to the given language

      • filterByFunc

        private Reviews filterByFunc(Reviews.FilterFunction filterFunc)
        Filters the collection of Review given a FilterFunction. Allows complex definition of filtering types with minimal duplicated code.
        Parameters:
        filterFunc - The FilterFunction that defines the filter to apply
        Returns:
        The filtered collection of Reviews
        See Also:
        Reviews.FilterFunction

      • filterById

        public Reviews filterById(int id)
        Filters the list to a collection of one Review with the given ID. Used for XSLT transformation where a single Review is required
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the Review to display
        Returns:
        A collection of one Review with the given ID number

      • filterByHotel

        public Reviews filterByHotel(Hotel hotel)
        Filters this collection of Review in a way that results in reviews for a given Hotel only.
        Parameters:
        hotel - The hotel for which the reviews were written
        Returns:
        The collection of Review that were written for the specified Hotel

      • filterByHotel

        public Reviews filterByHotel(long hotelId)
        Filters this collection of Review in a way that results in reviews for a given Hotel only.
        Parameters:
        hotelId - The hotel for which the reviews were written
        Returns:
        The collection of Review that were written for the specified Hotel

      • filterByStartDate

        public Reviews filterByStartDate(java.util.Date startBound)
        Filters the collection of Review by a starting date boundary. Reviews that were posted on or after the startBound will be returned
        Parameters:
        startBound - The earliest date on which the review could be posted
        Returns:
        A collection of Review filtered by a starting date

      • filterByEndDate

        public Reviews filterByEndDate(java.util.Date endBound)
        Filters the collection of Review by a ending date boundary. Reviews that were posted on or before the endBound will be returned
        Parameters:
        endBound - The latest date on which the review could be posted
        Returns:
        A collection of Review filtered by an ending date

      • filterByRating

        public Reviews filterByRating(int rating)
        Filters the collection of Review by rating Reviews that match the specified rating exactly will be returned
        Parameters:
        rating - The reviews to find with the given rating
        Returns:
        A collection of Review filtered by a rating
